def_cn: 使（自己）俯伏；使（自己）拜倒
def_en: If you prostrate yourself, you lie down flat on the ground, on your front, usually to show respect for God or a person in authority.
If you are lying prostrate, you are lying flat on the ground, on your front.

def_cn: 衰竭的；沮丧的；一蹶不振的
def_en: If someone is prostrate, they are so distressed or affected by a very bad experience that they are unable to do anything at all.
